about_the_game:
Community activity

The community does not regularly raffle SteamKey activities for free

Game introduction:


《Stellar Return》 is a unique text-based adventure game that immerses players in a challenging and mysterious interstellar exploration scenario. In this game, you assume the role of a mission controller at ground command, establishing communication with a stranded astronaut. Through pure text-based interactions, you must guide the astronaut to survive on an unknown Earth-like planet.

Core Mechanics


Gameplay revolves around text-based communication with the astronaut.
Every decision you make can impact the astronaut's chances of survival.
Your task is to guide the astronaut in exploring, surviving, repairing their spacecraft, and ultimately returning safely to Earth from this alien and hazardous world.

Key Features:


  • No visual aids: You must rely on the astronaut's descriptions to deduce the environment, analyze potential dangers, and formulate survival strategies.
  • Environmental exploration: From enigmatic valleys to ancient ruins, each scenario is rich with information and potential hazards.

Unique Elements:


  • Immersive text interaction: Experience a realistic interstellar rescue mission through a deep dialogue system.
  • Diverse environmental exploration: Direct the astronaut to investigate the crash site, mysterious valleys, eerie ancient ruins, and other intriguing locations.
  • Vitals Monitoring: Keep a watchful eye on the explorer's stats to ensure their survival on this desolate planet.
  • Artifact Gathering: Collect various relics to unlock multiple endings and unravel the mysteries of this alien world.

name: Stellar Return

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Remotely guide a stranded explorer on a mysterious planet. Ensure survival, uncover secrets, and orchestrate their return to Earth. Manage life support systems, gather unique artifacts to unlock multiple endings, and pursue the ultimate truth of this alien world.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
